unsw.dungeon

Interface BombState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Lit, Spawned, Unlit

    public interface BombState
    A bomb can have several states that can have will have different behaviors. The states are Spawned, Unlit and Lit. When the bomb is in the Spawned state, the bomb can only be picked up by a player. When the bomb is in the Unlit state, the bomb can only be activated by a player. When the bomb is in the lit state, it will automatically detonate and kill certain entities after 2 seconds.
    Author:
    zenmint

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BombState activateBomb(Bomb bomb, Player player)
      Bomb will get the coordinates of the player's current position and become visible if in Unlit state.
      void explode(Bomb bomb, Player player)
      Kills player, enemies and boulders in coordinates directly adjacent to and on the bomb.
      BombState pickUp(Bomb bomb, Player player)
      Player only picks up the bomb if player does not already have a bomb and bomb is in Spawned state.

    • Method Detail

      • pickUp

        BombState pickUp(Bomb bomb,
                 Player player)
        Player only picks up the bomb if player does not already have a bomb and bomb is in Spawned state. Player visual status will be holding a bomb if in Spawned state.
        Parameters:
        bomb - Bomb to be picked up by the player
        player - Player picking up the bomb
        Returns:
        Returns Unlit if in Spawned state.

      • activateBomb

        BombState activateBomb(Bomb bomb,
                       Player player)
        Bomb will get the coordinates of the player's current position and become visible if in Unlit state. Bomb will be removed from player and gain a Lit state if in Unlit state.
        Parameters:
        bomb - Bomb to be activated
        player - Player activating bomb
        Returns:
        Returns Lit if in Unlit state.

      • explode

        void explode(Bomb bomb,
             Player player)
        Kills player, enemies and boulders in coordinates directly adjacent to and on the bomb. Removes the bomb from the list of entities. Sets the visual status of the bomb to invisible.
        Parameters:
        bomb - Bomb to be exploded
        player - Player to explode bomb
